Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE Hotels are pleased to present for sale The Geraldton Hotel and Vibe Nightclub, Geraldton, WA.

Highlights of the property include:

* Excellent location with frontage to Gregory Street, Lester Avenue and Fitzgerald Street.
* A double level, heritage listed hotel building, with, in our opinion, the best beer garden in Geraldton.
* Vibe Nightclub is currently the only operating nightclub in town.
* 11 recently renovated hotel accommodation rooms (1 used as managers residence)
* Developed over three separate lots with a total area of approximately 4,219sqm.
* The continuing strength of the Mid-West resource industry with Geraldton being the capital of this region.
* Outstanding opportunity to buy a high cash flow business and freehold premises.
* Geraldton is located approximately 420km north of the Perth CBD in the State's mid-west.

OFFERS TO PURCHASE CLOSE 2:00PM (WST) ON THURSDAY 21 MARCH 2013 AT THE OFFICES OF CBRE PERTH

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SALE - THE GERALDTON HOTEL AND VIBE NIGHTCLUB

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
81* UNITS IN GERALDTON'S PREMIER RESORT

CBRE Hotels are pleased to offer to the international investment community an opportunity to invest in a major portion of the Broadwater Mariner Resort at 298 Chapman Road, Beresford - Geraldton Western Australia.

This in one line offering is for 81 of the strata titles within the Broadwater Mariner Resort and includes 11 residential townhouses which could be on sold for permanent occupation or leased on a long term basis.

A well located resort, approximately 50 metres* West of the beautiful Chapman Bay and 3 kilometres* North of the Geraldton Town Centre, the resort is within an easy walk to the Geraldton Marina which offers a variety of restaurants, cafes and taverns all accessible to resort guests.

Operated under a management agreement with Broadwater Hotels and Resorts, Broadwater expertly manage the resort on behalf of the individual owners. Broadwater are the successful managers of a number of hotels and resorts around Western Australia and are well known for providing comfortable and enjoyable holiday experiences for local, national and overseas guests.

*approx

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Flexibilility for wide range of uses

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE in conjunction with Active West Real Estate is pleased to present to market the opportunity to purchase this substantial Geraldton CBD Foreshore development site, located on Marine Terrace.

The most strategically located development site of scale in Geraldton, this truly generational opportunity offers a range of commercial and residential uses with potential for 5 levels and expansive ocean views.

- Suitable for retail, hotel, residential, commercial, large format, medical, aged care & others
- 3 extensive street frontages on Marine Terrace, Lester Avenue and Fitzgerald Street across 4 Super Lots
- 100m* to the waters edge and direct access to the foreshore parklands and recreation area
- Includes the Geraldton Beach Hotel, Bottlemart, Marine Terrace tenancies and Lester Avenue showrooms / warehouse.
- Residual holding income across numerous tenancies with opportunity for improvement and extension
	
The property benefits from favourable planning controls and has a Regional Centre zoning that allows for a 5-storey development with bonuses available should performance criteria be met.  

The properties are available in-one-line, as individual lots or any combination of lots.

For more information please contact the exclusive selling agents.



*approx
